name: mopn0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wcel(c2, ctop))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(emptycls, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(emptycls, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, ctop))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(emptycls, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ ∅ ∈ c2)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Top → ∅ ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))

comment: The empty set is an open set of a metric space. Part of Theorem T1 of [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.)
